original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields down, Rupee opens at 310/320 against US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were down at open on Thursday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 30.10/40 percent on Tuesday, down from 30.25/75 percent on Wednesday.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 27.80/28.10 percent, down from 27.90/28.00 percent from Wednesday.
Sri Lanka rupee opened at 310/320 rupees against the US dollar. (Colombo/ March23/2023)
